Advantages

Past

As the structure of the Past is staff-generated, its up to the staff to generate establish the importance of the Houses and make them viable.

  • Houses should have the highest level NPC Trainers available in whatever specialty.
  • Houses should have a smith willing to brand member's equippment with the sigil at house expense.
  • Character's who are known members of a house should have a bonus on their Merchant checks with some merchants (and probably a corrisponding penalty with others.)

There should probably not be special skills "unique" to the houses, but high level trainers may have the same effect. Similarly, bases and maneuvers can provide a similar benefit- though, like unique skills, these advantages can be diluted by dedicated players who join houses simply to teach the house skills.Darker Dreams 18:43, 9 January 2008 (CET)


Future

Future houses are up to their player-creators to provide benefits and enforcement. Cheers.Darker Dreams 18:43, 9 January 2008 (CET)


Future House System

I honestly feel that there is no need for a special bonus or status as a "Major House." "Guilds" form in MMORPGs, the House system will accomidate an in-game expression of that. Everyone will learn who the largest, most powerful, etc guild/houses are. Those will be the "Major houses." No extra mechanics required. The differentiation between Major and Minor in the Past is really a tab to keep track of how much power we have/will give the house... if a minor house is gaining way more players than a Major house we need to reexamine those houses. Darker Dreams 18:43, 9 January 2008 (CET)
